text:
@politico Hide the ball who's on first firing of SDNY attorney investigating #DonaldTrumpAndFriends another light moment too? HAHAHAHA

But joking about COVID-19 when 120,000 Americans died and more still dying every day not so funny. https://t.co/mQag6aXspy
